txt.en: Friend to the Heroes of Limlight Gorge

The beasts of Limlight Gorge pose a threat to the people of Stangard, yet there are few brave enough to face such deadly creatures - fewer still that live to tell the tale of their heroism round the camp-fire in years to come.
You must earn Friend standing with the Heroes of Limlight Gorge
Your efforts have earned you a standing of friendship with the Heroes of Limlight Gorge.
